# PBI #3: Define Domain Models and Repository Interface

**Priority:** High  
**Story Points:** 3  
**Labels:** `enhancement`, `domain`, `architecture`

## Description
Create domain layer components following Clean Architecture principles.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `TagSuggestionModel` data class created
- [ ] `GeminiNanoStatus` enum created
- [ ] `TagSuggestionRepository` interface created
- [ ] Models are pure Kotlin (no Android dependencies)
- [ ] Repository interface defines clear contract
- [ ] Models include proper KDoc documentation

## Dependencies
- Depends on PBI #2

See TAG_SUGGESTIONS_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md for full details.
